product_details.name: KOORUI 24 inch Curved Monitor, Full HD 1080P Curved Computer Monitor, 1500R Screen, HDMI VGA, Tilt Adjustment, LCD Display, Eye Care, Black 24N5CA
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 7.56 x 16.04 x 21.13 inches. Item Weight: 7.98 pounds. Standing screen display size: 24 Inches. Aspect Ratio: 16:9. Voltage: 2.4E+2 Volts (AC). Resolution: 1920 x 1080 Pixels.

banner_details:
This banner is a vibrant and engaging product advertisement for a curved gaming monitor. The layout is split vertically with the left half featuring a vivid purple gradient background and the right half in solid black, which highlights the product image. The main title (`heading`) and supporting descriptor (`subheading`) are placed on the left, with a large size spec (`tagline`) in bold yellow to instantly grab attention. Three boxed feature callouts (`feature_text_1`, `feature_text_2`, `feature_text_3`) highlight key specs, bordered by thin white strokes. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large yellow text beneath them. A bold yellow call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with contrasting dark text (`cta`) encourages purchase. Decorative circular accents in golden yellow add depth and energy. The monitor image (`product_image`) sits dynamically on the black background, tilted slightly to enhance its immersive curve.

**Color Palette**
- Deep Purple: #2D0A31
- Bright Yellow: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #1A1A1A
- Gradient Accent Purple: #4B0082 → #8A2BE2
product_color: The product image showcases a dynamic and visually striking color palette to highlight the Koorui monitor's vibrant display. The key colors include a rich **electric purple (#8015AA)** that sets the background, and a mix of **bright orange (#FFA500)** and **deep yellow (#FFCC00)** that form the central splash, drawing attention to the monitor’s vivid picture quality. Accents of **turquoise blue (#40E0D0)** and **hot pink (#FF69B4)** add contrast and energy. These colors are seamlessly blended in a swirling, ink-in-water style, while each remains distinct due to luminous lighting and sharp contrast, effectively emphasizing brightness, clarity, and color depth of the screen.
